name: Lawn Mower Clash Bang Boom
description:
Lawn Mower Clash Bang Boom Game is a Action packed game with an important mission to remove all of your enemies from the game. Your aim is to get rid of your enemy in a close arena fight by hitting him with your LAWAN MOWER to the finish his energy. Hit your enemy as many times as possible.And do the same with all of them for the completion of each level.

-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking Mower

-Unique and smooth gameplay

-Exciting

-Different terrains/location

- EASY controls with only 2 buttons

- CRAZY jumps and loops

- Beautiful off-road terrains
